txt.en:
After encountering and defeating the elusive wolf, Drugodech, you have claimed a trophy that may be of value to the Dúnedain of Cardolan.

As you inspect Drugodech's paw, you take note of its softness and of the dried blood caked between its toes.

You should bring this trophy to Gaerion, a trophy-hunter and lore-keeper of the Dúnedain of Cardolan.
Deliver Drugodech's paw to Gaerion in Cardolan

Gaerion can be found at Sírlond in Cardolan.\n\nYou have acquired a trophy from an elusive foe in Cardolan. You should deliver it to Gaerion, a trophy-hunter and lore-keeper of the Dúnedain of Cardolan.
After encountering the elusive wolf, Drugodech, you have claimed a trophy that may be of value to the Dúnedain of Cardolan.

'Hail, traveller. What's that you've got there?'

Gaerion inspects Drugodech's paw closely, taking note of its softness.

'A fine trophy, friend. It is well-known that only a fool would turn their back upon one of the wolves of Cardolan. If you would be willing to part with this trophy, I will see to it that you are compensated.

'Yes? Very good. You have my thanks!'
